title: Public Procurement Notice Status Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for the lifecycle status of procurement notices and calls for tenders.

terms.label: Planned
terms.definition: The buyer has signaled an intention to procure but has not yet published a formal call for tenders or request for proposals.

terms.label: Active
terms.definition: The notice is published and suppliers may submit requests to participate, expressions of interest, or tenders according to the procedure rules.

terms.label: Closed to Responses
terms.definition: The deadline for submitting responses or tenders has passed and no new submissions are accepted under this notice.

terms.label: Cancelled
terms.definition: The notice or associated procurement procedure has been cancelled without awarding a contract under this notice.

terms.label: Complete
terms.definition: The notice lifecycle is complete, and awards or contracts resulting from the procedure have been published or recorded as final.

terms.label: Other Notice Status
terms.definition: A notice status that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary but is necessary to represent source system distinctions.
